There's the drunken Kurd killer,

There's the megalomaniac who started a
civil war and killed half of Ireland,

there's the pretty,
if rather thin, princess,

erm, there's the bearded plagiarist
or the boring bard,

or you could vote
for Isambard Kingdom Brunel.
I mean, as I say, I'm not biased,

but he was a genius who quite simply
built the world we live in today.
It's that simple.

So, I'll see you on the other side
of the credits,
but from here, from everyone, good night!
